# relativeTemperatureSetting

**Instance Property**

A relative temperature setting.

## Declaration

```swift
var relativeTemperatureSetting: INRelativeSetting { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to adjust the temperature up or down based relative to its current position. When adjusting temperatures up or down to the next setting, you define the number of degrees to add or subtract from the current setting. The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRelativeSetting/unknown] when the user modified a different climate control setting.

## Getting the Climate Control Settings

- **enableClimateControl**: A Boolean value indicating whether to turn on the climate control system.
- **enableAutoMode**: A Boolean value indicating whether to enable automatic mode for the climate control system.
- **airCirculationMode**: The air circulation mode for the climate control system.
- **temperature**: The specific temperature to set for the climate control system.
- **climateZone**: The seat position to have its climate settings modified.
